name: GoAndDie
description:
The king is bored with his life, luckily Death offered him a new one in exchange for his current one.

But, he is a king no one really wants him to die.

So it's your job to make that happen

The mage only cares about the king

The knight, unmoving, and his sword out for some reason

The priest, can't actually heal, only does buff spells

Music by: Frelon-K

This is my first game that I ever finished without a step by step. Lot's of things were kinda garbage but hey it was a very good learning experience. At least the sprites look nice
